extensionDescription.message: Le recipientes multi-conto te adjuta a mantener tote le partes de tu vita online continite in schedas differente. Etiquettas personalisate e schedas codificate per color adjuta a tener separate le differente activitates, como: compras online, planification de viages o controlo del e-mails de labor.
extensionDescription.description: Description of the extension. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Multi-Account Containers".

alwaysOpenSiteInContainer.message: Sempre aperir le sito in recipente

openNewTabInThisContainer.message: Aperi nove scheda in iste recipente

openTabs.description: Section title for tabs that are currently open in that container

moveTabsToANewWindow.message: Mover schedas a un nove fenestra

onboarding-1-header.message: Un maniera melior pro gerer tote le cosas que tu face online

onboarding-1-description.message: Usa le recipentes pro organisar activitates, gerer contos e mantener tu concentration ubi tu lo desira.

onboarding-2-header.message: Pone le recipentes a laborar pro te.

onboarding-2-description.message: Functionalitates como codice de color e schedas de recipiente separate te adjuta a trovar facilemente le cosas, concentra tu attention e minimisa le distractiones.

onboarding-3-header.message: Un loco pro cata cosa, e cata cosa in su loco.

onboarding-3-description.message: Initia con le recipentes que nos ha create o crea tu proprie.

onboarding-4-header.message: Sempre aperi le sitos in le recipentes que tu desira.

onboarding-4-description.message: Clicca dextre intra un scheda recipente pro assignar le sito a sempre aperir lo in ille recipente.

onboarding-5-header.message: Schedas recipente quando te besonia illos.

onboarding-5-description.message: Retene pulsate longemente le button Nove Scheda pro crear un nove Scheda recipente.

onboarding-6-header.message: Le Synchronisation de recipentes es ora disponibile!

onboarding-6-description.message: Activa le synchronisation pro compartir le assignationes de recipente e sito con ulle computator connectite a tu Firefox Account

onboarding-7-header.message: Firefox Account es necesse pro synchronisar.

onboarding-7-description.message: Clicca Authenticar se, pro confirmar que tu Firefox Account es active.

onboarding-8-description.message: Ora le recipentes pote integrar se con Mozilla VPN o tu proprie proxy pro crear un connexion secur, private, que protege tu activitate.

spreadTheWord.message: Si tu apprecia Recipentes, adjuta nos a diffunder le parola!

removeThisContainerConfirmation.message: Desira tu vermente remover iste Recipente?

info.description: Alternative text for the i icon in the toolbar icon pop-up

openThisSiteConfirmation.message: Aperi iste sito in tu recipente assignate?

wouldYouStillLikeToOpenConfirmation.message: Vole tu ancora aperir iste sito in le actual recipente?

rememberMyDecision.message: Rememorar mi decision pro iste sito

onboardingToggle.message: Mutar isto pro revider le quadros de introduction.

enableBookMarkMenusDescription.message: Iste parametro te permitte de aperir un marcapagina o un plica de marcapaginas in un recipente.

enableSyncDescription.message: Iste parametro te permitte de synchronisar tu assignationes de recipentes e sitos inter apparatos.

syncExcludeDescription.message: Excluder le synchronisation del containers quando lor nomine non concorda le expression regular specificate insensibile al majusculas.

replaceTab.message: Replaciar le scheda in vice del creation de un nove

replaceTabDescription.message: Replaciar le scheda active si un pagina que es assignate a un altere recipente es aperite (in vice del mantener aperte le scheda active). Aperir schedas con le button medie del mus non es afficite.

editWhichContainer.message: Modificar qual recipente es aperite quando on usa le vias breve numerate.

keyboardShortCut.message: Recipente a aperir con le via breve de claviero $keyId$ .

confirmNavigationTitle.description: This is the title of a confirmation page. Please do not translate "Multi-Account Containers".

youAskedFirefox.message: Tu ha demandate a Firefox de sempre aperir $containerName$ pro iste sito:

chooseLocation.description: Location refers to the geographical position used by the VPN

protectYourContainers.message: Protege tu recipentes con Mozilla VPN

protectThisContainer.message: Protege iste recipente con Mozilla VPN

useCustomLocation.message: Usa un position personalisate pro iste recipente .

mozillaVpnMustBeOn.message: Mozilla VPN debe esser active pro usar iste functionalitate.

proxyNowAvailable.message: Ora con Mozilla VPN e parametros del servitor proxy avantiate

tooltipWarning.message: Iste Recipente es configurate pro usar un proxy Mozilla VPN, ma Mozilla VPN non es active. Activa Mozilla VPN pro usar iste recipente.

integratewithmozillavpn.message: Integra tu recipentes con Mozilla VPN

mozillaVpnAndProxyPermissionsTitle.message: Mozilla VPN e permissiones del proxy

nativeMessagingPermissionTitle.message: Premitte al extension de excambiar messages con programmas differente de Firefox

nativeMessagingPermissionDescription.message: Iste parametros permitte al extension de excambiar messages con le cliente de Mozilla VPN e es necessari pro facer functionar le integration de Mozilla VPN.
nativeMessagingPermissionDescription.description: 'This setting' refers to the permission indicated in nativeMessagingPermissionTitle

proxyPermissionTitle.message: Premitte al extension de controlar le parametros del proxy

proxyPermissionDescription.message: Isto te permitte de usar le parametros de proxy avantiate e de activar le functionalitates de integration de Mozilla VPN.
proxyPermissionDescription.description: 'This' refers to the permission indicated in proxyPermissionTitle

additionalPermissionNeeded.message: Iste functionalitate require un altere permission pro functionar. Le permissiones pote esser disactivate sempre ab le pagina del parametros.
additionalPermissionNeeded.description: 'This feature' is the browser proxy permission. This string appears on the 'Advanced Proxy Settings' panel when the proxy permission is disabled.

mozillaVpnRequiresAdditionalPermissions.message: Le integration con Mozilla VPN pro functionar require un abonamento e permissiones additional.

integrateContainers.message: Integra tu recipentes con Mozilla VPN

theme.description: Theme section title in the option page

themeAuto.description: Default value for the theme option select tag

themeLight.description: Value for the theme option select tag

themeDark.description: Value for the theme option select tag
